comment: Dr. Davis was an awesome teacher! I was going through an extremely hard time when I was taking her class, she was extremely patient with me and provided me with extra credit. She also is big on participation, if you participate you will get a good grade..
Studying is essential to passing. The notes from class alone weren't enough for clarification so I'd recommend that you get the book. She's easy to approach and very helpful. Would take again.

Dr Davis did a good job.  She is slow returning test and papers.  This made it difficult to determine if you needed extra credit (but she did offer it).  Test were moderately hard.  You need to know the material.  You will need the book.

Tests can be difficult and require a lot of studying. Class got off track quite often because students ask questions alot. Book is required to pass. She gives a lot of quizzes but they are generally short and simple. You have to write a few papers. She takes several weeks to get grades back. She is very sweet and easy to approach. Would take again.

I enjoyed having Dr. Davis as a professor. Her tests are difficult though. You have to read and really study to get a good grade on the tests though. I always thought they were easy and ended up getting a D or C on them. She takes a super long time to grade and we would always fall behind in class. In her defense, our class asked tons of questions.
Professor Davis is a great teacher. Lectures were fun with her and very interesting. The only thing that I didn't like was that she takes a log time to grade assignments. Otherwise I would recommend

Love Dr. Kimberly, she gives off good energy and she wants to see everyone do well. Lectures are simple and straightforward as well as exams. She always use personal experiences and she knows her stuff!

The only bad thing I have to say about her is that she takes weeks,months to grade. I understand that there were about 200 students in the class, but when the test is Scantron, and my assignments are not online from months before, its really hard to figure out if I need to do the extra credit and very stressful to figure out how your progess is.

She's great. Grading criteria is clearly outlined in the syllabus. Only 2 tests, a midterm and a final that are over 100 questions, 5 quizzes that are mostly in class at about 12 questions. PARTICIPATION MATTERS. Attendance is worth a lot of points. In class assignments are mostly graded for completion and are worth the points of a final.

Takes forever to grade an assignment. I have yet to have her reply to an email. I learned more by reading the book, but to pass there class you must show up to class. She might be a great hybrid teacher, but a teacher with 200 + all in class. I would avoid her at all costs.

She takes FOREVER to grade assignments and does not give any feedback. She says she will post a quiz or assignment online by a certain time and day but it is never there when you look for it. For the lectures, she reads straight from the slides or skips almost every slide. The TAs were just a awful as she was.

She taught a class size of over 100+ students, but she gives in class assignments , quizzes, and attendance points, so while it does take time to grade, she does it with the intentions of helping you, by giving you more opportunities than just two tests. She is willing to help if you ask for it, but you do have to study. Her expectations are clear!
Seriously the worst class ever. Took over a month to get our midterm back.  You want to know your grade good luck. Would avoid taking at all cost. Never responds back to email either.
Eh. I didn't get clear feedback for the assignments and the tests have random questions that aren't in the book or the lectures. Not bad, but not great.

She takes absolutely forever to grade anything(going on 3 weeks for a midterm grade). Have done 4-5 in class assignments with no grades posted. Emails are never responded back to. You must read period, you must attend class, she skips around a lot. Overall not recommended.

She takes forever to grade her test. There is only a midterm and a final for test. She does have extra credit that is very simple. Attendance is huge! If you do not read you will not pass her class. Her test are tough, you must know in great detail. Takes forever to get back to you, because she has another job. I would not take her again.

She is a very great teacher. All of her test are online, and she gives plenty of time to finish the test if you try to use the book. There are in and out of class assignments, you will have to attend classes. There is no project, and there are weekly discussion, but there are fun. she can distract you because she is very beautiful.

I took this as a hybrid course. Nice professor. Takes a long time to grade things and reply to emails. You have weekly discussions. She does not cover everything that will be on your test (hence, the hybrid, but I know professors who are hybrid who only test on what they teach). Isn't the best professors, I have seen better.

Great teacher, she is one of the best teacher at KSU. I took her class as a hybrid class. She taught very  well,  student will have to take test at home, and she gives plenty of time to finish even if you try to use the book. I would highly recommend her.

Amazing course and professor. She makes the material relatable and interesting. You do have to actually pay attention to do well but she does power point presentations and occasionally gave study guides. Attendance does count and there are in class assignments. But she is great, you will want to go to class!

I love Ms. Davis. If you can take her class. She uses power-point for her notes and there very clear and easy to understand. She has lots of class discussions and try to give real life examples. her test are easy if you study and put in the work.
Great teacher. Easy class, had her for lifespan...she'd be perfect if only she responded to emails

Professor Davis was awesome!! She's very kind and really cares about students learning Psychology. She tries her best to meet everyone's needs, too. I missed by first exam & she allowed me to retake it. It doesn't hurt that she's quite funny too. I would definitely recommend her to ANYONE!

Dr. Davis is AMAZING. So knowledgeable and kind. She's pretty funny, too. I feel like Human Sexuality should be a general education course. This class consisted of 4 or 5 tests, 1 group presentation (not hard) and a paper. Show up to class because it is interesting (you'll miss out if you skip), and there are in-class activities. I recommend this.
Took this as a hybrid and it was ridiculously easy! The tests are online and mostly word for word. She is very helpful and nice too. Definitely take her if you can!

Probably the nicest professor you will ever meet! She loves her job and students! But her class is very hard. She uses examples for her test questions, so don't study definitions. Go to class for the in-class assignments. You can't make them up. There are about 10 of them and all together they add up to a test grade. She's so nice and emails back.

I loved Professor Davis, she made class fun and everyone felt comfortable enough to share stories in class. If you take notes on the PP and study word for word for the tests you will make an A. Definitely recommend!!
Awesome teacher, clear on material, uses textbook and PP for tests, overall great class, easy A if you just attend class & study! She is very friendly, open, and explains things well.
This is the second class I've taken with Dr. Davis, and I plan to take more. She is such a great teacher, and I recommend her greatly!

Easy class and loved Dr. Davis. Attendance isn't mandatory but quizzes cannot be made up. She does drop the lowest 2. Lectures are PP out of the book. I didn't open mine at all this semester so may be a couple bucks to save. Interesting class. Took hybrid.
She is a fantastic professor who really wants you to do well! Take her for sure!

Professor Davis is awesome !!! I took her hybrid class and all of our tests were open note/ open book online!!! It was so great and she is so helpful about working with your schedule and your grades. The writing assignments are pretty easy and interesting! Def Recommend Her!!!

This is not the easiest class, but she makes it as easy and as clear as humanly possible. Always put you first and is willing to help with any question you bring to her. Very nice and is very interesting.

Wonderful teacher, makes you think outside the box, had two take home essay tests(takes some time to complete). Would recommend taking her class to anyone, going to take her for another psychology class. I recommend going to class because of the random in class assignments! GREAT TEACHER, she also works in the field so you get some great insight!

She is a fantastic teacher! Basically lets students direct the class, based on what you want to learn/discuss. Class requires a lot of paper writing, but Dr. Davis is a very lenient grader and exceptionally fair. She really knows her stuff and loves her subject. Take her!
She's the sweetest teacher. She's easy to talk to about everything - class or personal things. She is very easy to understand too!

AWESOME TEACHER!!! If you come to class and take notes you will pass. She has open discussions that are awesome as well make the class zoom by. Not your average psychology teacher. Will help with any questions are concerns. Woud take her agan with no problem. AWESOME
She's great!!! Shes super clear and let's you know what will be on tests! Class is easy but she has great in class discussions! Love her and wish I could take her for the next psych class!

Great teacher, you will have the best in class discussions ever. Attendance is not mandatory, but highly recommended due to the unannounced in class assignments. If you apply yourself you will get a good grade in the class. She makes learning fun and she really takes the time to make sure you know the information. I would definitely take her again.

Great teacher, you will have the best in class discussions ever.  Attendance is not mandatory, but highly recommended due to the unannounced in class assignments.  If you apply yourself you will get a good grade in the class.  She makes learning fun and she really takes the time to make sure you know the information.

Would highly recommend this professor - really enjoyed this class.  Attendance is mandatory, and there are assignments (both in class and take home).  Exams were primarily over the lectures, but reading the chapters is recommended.  Classes were a lot of discussion (participation), so it felt like the class went fast!

Great teacher that likes a lot of class participation. I rarely used my textbook, but if you're looking for an A, I suggest reading the chapters. She does have some small in-class assignments and a few bigger writing assignments. She does challenge you to think AND learn APA citing. Overall, LOVED the teacher and the class.
